monday_articles.celebrities_article: When it comes to being a trendsetter, there are not many figures in the beauty industry who can hold a candle to Hailey Bieber. Known for her model-off-duty street style, we're adding Hailey's new contoured bob haircut to the request list for 2023. Hailey Bieber is certainly all-encompassing when it comes to beauty. She has created many trends for hair and hairstyles. Girls around the world are running to hair salons in order to achieve Hailey's hair color.
monday_articles.shopping_article: It’s no secret the the 24-year-old knows a thing or two about skincare. Bieber is often sitting on Instagram masking and occasionally shares her lengthy routine on how to achieve a glowing complexion – you need to try this hack. She is also the face of BareMinerals and has partnered with L’Oreal and ModelCo in the past.

quote: Beauty is not in the face; beauty is a light in the heart -Khalil Gibran

wednesday_articles.celebrities_title: Sofia Richie's Style Is the Epitome Of 'Old Money'
wednesday_articles.celebrities_article: New TikTok 'It' girl Richie Grainge (the youngest daughter of singer Lionel Richie) has become the poster child for the laid-back, modern take on the trend. Ever since she unexpectedly joined TikTok during her wedding week, Richie Grainge has become the style icon of the moment with low heels, tailored looks, demure nails, and slick hair.
wednesday_articles.shopping_article: The two align perfectly on aesthetics, yes, but the partnership runs so much deeper. "The first time I fell in love with Jo Malone London was in my husband's parent's house", Richie says in a video posted with the brand. "They burn it constantly, and every time I went over to their house, I was like, What is this you're burning? I need it!" Now, she says it's the only thing she and her husband have burning in their home. Richie also swears by the brand's colognes. "I found my signature scent," she says of Jo Malone London Wood Sage & Sea Salt

quote: Wanting to be someone else is a waste of the person you are - Marilyn Monroe
